alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Okaloosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Coastal (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 02 at 4:07PM EST until January 03 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Alabama, Mobile Central, Baldwin Central, Mobile Coastal and Baldwin Coastal Counties. In Florida, Escambia Coastal, Santa Rosa Coastal and Okaloosa Coastal Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog will develop near the coast early this evening and gradually spread into coastal Alabama and northwest Florida tonight through Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Okaloosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Coastal
